text: <@U38EZFVFE> thanks, but loop.index doesn't work in this case. Why? Because inside the loop we are taking only some posts with a specific tag. So the loop.index of the selected posts might be (for example), 2,12,34,56,99. There's a list of all blog posts and we need to find the first 5 with a specific tag, so loop.index doesn't work in this case. Sorry for the late reply, I was out of office.
The code you posted is trying to do a subtraction: `<http://request.headers.cf|request.headers.cf> - ipcountry` due to the dash in the variable name
Hi there, i have a template where blog comments module are actived or not, I would like to know if there is an helper in hubl to check if this module is actived or not. Does someone knows ?
